snippet: President Obama will meet executives from leading technology companies like Google and Apple on Tuesday.
abstract: White House says Pres Obama will meet executives from leading technology companies like Google and Apple to discuss ways to improve federal health care exchange website.
lead_paragraph: President Obama will meet executives from leading technology companies like Google and Apple on Tuesday.

headline.main: Obama to Seek Advice on Portal at Tech Meeting
headline.print_headline: Obama Seeks Tech Advice On Portal
